participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and a bit shy, enjoys simple pleasures in life.
participant_1.background: i work for our local supermarket. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i've a cat named spook. i've never been out of ohio.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Determined and assertive, with a hint of sarcasm and a desire for change.
participant_2.background: i am a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i've two grown children who never visit. i used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind.
